42  struct primitives {
43  template<class T, class Archive>
44  void xml_write(Archive& archive, std::string key, T& x);
45 
46  template< class ValueType, class Archive>
47  void xml_read(Archive& archive, std::string key, /*out*/ValueType* var, size_t pos);
48 
49  template<class T, class Archive>
50  void write(Archive& archive, T& x);
51 
52  template< class ValueType, class Archive>
53  void read(Archive& archive, /*out*/ValueType* var);
54  };
55 
56  template<class T, class Archive>
57  void primitives::xml_write(Archive& archive, std::string key, T& x) {
58  archive.write(key, x);
59  }
60 
61  template< class ValueType, class Archive>
62  void primitives::xml_read(Archive& archive, std::string key, /*out*/ValueType* var, size_t pos) {
63  archive.read(key, *var, (int) pos);
64  }
65 
66  template<class T, class Archive>
67  void primitives::write(Archive& archive, T& x) {
68  archive << x;
69  }
70 
71  template< class ValueType, class Archive>
72  void primitives::read(Archive& archive, /*out*/ValueType* var) {
73  archive >> *var;
74  }

101  archive.get_stack_object(key, *var, (int) pos);

104  template<class T, class Archive>
105  void objects::write(Archive& archive, T& x) {
106  x.serialize(archive);
107  }
108 
109  template< class ValueType, class Archive>
110  void objects::read(Archive& archive, /*out*/ValueType* var) {
111  (*var).serialize(archive);
112  }

157  template <class CollectionContent>
158  struct sequence {
159  template <class InputIterator, class Archive>
160  size_t xml_write(InputIterator first, InputIterator last, Archive& archive);
161 
162  template <class Container, class InputIterator, class Archive>
163  void xml_read(Container& container, InputIterator insert, size_t len, Archive& archive);
164 
165  template <class InputIterator, class Archive>
166  size_t write(InputIterator first, InputIterator last, Archive& archive);
167 
168  template <class Container, class InputIterator, class Archive>
169  void read(Container& container, InputIterator insert, size_t len, Archive& archive);
170  };
171 
172  template <class CollectionContent> template< class InputIterator, class Archive>
173  size_t sequence<CollectionContent>::xml_write(InputIterator first, InputIterator last, Archive& archive) {
174  CollectionContent content;
175  size_t len = 0;
176  for (; first != last; ++first) {
177  ++len;
178  content.xml_write(archive, "item", (*first));
179  }
180 
181  return len;
182  }
183 
184  template <class CollectionContent> template <class Container, class InputIterator, class Archive>
185  void sequence<CollectionContent>::xml_read(Container& container, InputIterator insert, size_t len, Archive& archive) {
186  CollectionContent content;
187  insert_iterator<Container > ii(container, insert);
188  typename iterator_traits< InputIterator >::value_type var;
189 
190  for (size_t pos = 0; pos < len; ++pos) {
191  content.xml_read(archive, "item", &var, pos);
192  *ii++ = var;
193  }
194  }
195 
196  template <class CollectionContent> template< class InputIterator, class Archive>
197  size_t sequence<CollectionContent>::write(InputIterator first, InputIterator last, Archive& archive) {
198  CollectionContent content;
199  size_t len = 0;
200  for (; first != last; ++first) {
201  ++len;
202  content.write(archive, (*first));
203  }
204 
205  return len;
206  }
207 
208  template <class CollectionContent> template <class Container, class InputIterator, class Archive>
209  void sequence<CollectionContent>::read(Container& container, InputIterator insert, size_t len, Archive& archive) {
210  CollectionContent content;
211  insert_iterator<Container > ii(container, insert);
212  typename iterator_traits< InputIterator >::value_type var;
213 
214  for (size_t pos = 0; pos < len; ++pos) {
215  content.read(archive, &var);
216  *ii++ = var;
217  }
218  }

226  template <class FirstContent, class SecondContent>
227  struct association {
228  template <class InputIterator, class Archive>
229  size_t xml_write(InputIterator first, InputIterator last, Archive& archive);
230 
231  template <class Container, class InputIterator, class Archive>
232  void xml_read(Container& container, InputIterator insert, size_t len, Archive& archive);
233 
234  template <class InputIterator, class Archive>
235  size_t write(InputIterator first, InputIterator last, Archive& archive);
236 
237  template <class Container, class InputIterator, class Archive>
238  void read(Container& container, InputIterator insert, size_t len, Archive& archive);
239  };
240 
241  template <class FirstContent, class SecondContent> template <class InputIterator, class Archive>
242  size_t association<FirstContent, SecondContent>::xml_write(InputIterator first, InputIterator last, Archive& archive) {
243  FirstContent first_content;
244  SecondContent second_content;
245  size_t len = 0;
246  for (; first != last; ++first) {
247  ++len;
248  first_content.xml_write(archive, "first", (*first).first);
249  second_content.xml_write(archive, "second", (*first).second);
250  }
251 
252  return len;
253  }
254 
255  template <class FirstContent, class SecondContent> template <class Container, class InputIterator, class Archive>
256  void association<FirstContent, SecondContent>::xml_read(Container& container, InputIterator insert, size_t len, Archive& archive) {
257  FirstContent first_content;
258  SecondContent second_content;
259 
260  insert_iterator<Container > ii(container, insert);
261  typename Container::key_type first;
262  typename iterator_traits< InputIterator >::value_type::second_type second;
263 
264  for (size_t pos = 0; pos < len; ++pos) {
265  first_content.xml_read(archive, "first", &first, pos);
266  second_content.xml_read(archive, "second", &second, pos);
267 
268  typename iterator_traits< InputIterator >::value_type my_pair(first, second);
269 
270  *ii++ = my_pair;
271  }
272  }
273 
274  template <class FirstContent, class SecondContent> template <class InputIterator, class Archive>
275  size_t association<FirstContent, SecondContent>::write(InputIterator first, InputIterator last, Archive& archive) {
276  FirstContent first_content;
277  SecondContent second_content;
278  size_t len = 0;
279  for (; first != last; ++first) {
280  ++len;
281  first_content.write(archive, (*first).first);
282  second_content.write(archive, (*first).second);
283  }
284 
285  return len;
286  }
287 
288  template <class FirstContent, class SecondContent> template <class Container, class InputIterator, class Archive>
289  void association<FirstContent, SecondContent>::read(Container& container, InputIterator insert, size_t len, Archive& archive) {
290  FirstContent first_content;
291  SecondContent second_content;
292 
293  insert_iterator<Container > ii(container, insert);
294  typename Container::key_type first;
295  typename iterator_traits< InputIterator >::value_type::second_type second;
296 
297  for (size_t pos = 0; pos < len; ++pos) {
298  first_content.read(archive, &first);
299  second_content.read(archive, &second);
300 
301  typename iterator_traits< InputIterator >::value_type my_pair(first, second);
302 
303  *ii++ = my_pair;
304  }
305  }
306 
312  template <class InputIterator, class CollectionCategory>
313  void xml_write(CollectionCategory, InputIterator first, InputIterator last, xml_archive& archive, std::string label) {
314  map<string, string> attr;
315  CollectionCategory category;
316 
317  if (archive.is_loading()) throw new eternity::exception("called xml_serialize 4 params overload with a storing archive");
318 
319  size_t size = distance(first, last);
320 
321  ostringstream os;
322  os << (unsigned int) size;
323  attr["size"] = string(os.str());
324  //os.str(""); // delete buffer
325 
326  archive.make_branch(label, attr);
327  category.xml_write(first, last, archive);
328 
329  archive.leave_current_branch();
330 
331  };
332 
333  template <class Container, class InputIterator, class CollectionCategory>
334  void xml_read(CollectionCategory, Container& container, InputIterator inserter, xml_archive& archive, std::string label) {
335  map<string, string> attr;
336  CollectionCategory category;
337  size_t len;
338 
339  if (archive.is_storing()) throw new eternity::exception("called xml_serialize 3 params overload with a storing archive");
340 
341  attr = archive.enter_branch(label, 0);
342 
343  if (attr["size"].empty()) throw new eternity::exception("missing size attribute for node " + label);
344  len = atoi(attr["size"].c_str());
345 
346  //archive.read("size",len,0);
347  category.xml_read(container, inserter, len, archive);
348  archive.leave_current_branch();
349 
350  };
351 
352  template <class InputIterator, class CollectionCategory>
353  void binary_write(CollectionCategory, InputIterator first, InputIterator last, bin_archive& archive) {
354  map<string, string> attr;
355  CollectionCategory category;
356 
357  if (archive.is_loading()) throw new eternity::exception("called xml_serialize 4 params overload with a storing archive");
358 
359  size_t size = distance(first, last);
360 
361  archive << size;
362 
363  category.write(first, last, archive);
364 
365  };
366 
367  template <class Container, class InputIterator, class CollectionCategory>
368  void binary_read(CollectionCategory, Container& container, InputIterator inserter, bin_archive& archive) {
369  map<string, string> attr;
370  CollectionCategory category;
371  size_t len;
372 
373  if (archive.is_storing()) throw new eternity::exception("called xml_serialize 3 params overload with a storing archive");
374 
375  archive >> len;
376 
377  category.read(container, inserter, len, archive);
378 
379  };
